item.title: /metrics lint
item.description: This tool enables you to validate the format of Prometheus metrics, and make sure they can be scraped by a Prometheus server. Prometheus supports two exposition formats: the Prometheus text-based exposition format and OpenMetrics. The text-based exposition format is widespread, and many applications and client libraries supports it. Additionally, it can be used from scripts, to push metrics to the Pushgateway or written to *.prom files, to be collected by the textfile collectors (available in both the Node Exporter and the Windows Exporter).
